posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/w-orange.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition 13[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Welcome back to another edition of Hack Forum News. Where we keep you up to date on the weekly events and news happening on site and around the world. If you have never heard of the Hack Forum News, don't worry, we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journalists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and the events happening around the world.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[b]This week's headlines are quite similar to last week's but it's always nice to give them a second view or a first if you missed them last week.[/b]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6307040][color=#ffffff]Stanley Fan Award Goal[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]

Last week [mention=1] released a brand new award for everyone to earn. With this new award you will need to make 250 posts that are replies to Stanley's threads. [mention=1337] has been making threads for a while now and with this we can see a massive increase in replies to the threads the [mention=1337] bot is making. Good luck everyone award hunting.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6307025][color=#ffffff]New Sales Tags[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]

With the recent changes to the design of the site, @Omniscient has now started to look into changing the look of the current sales tags used on the site. The thread is looking for feedback from site members to see what they think of the new design made by [mention=776749]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299866][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums News Team - Become a Writer[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=2331053]

Are you looking to join the HF news team? Do you enjoy making threads or even want to become a better writer? Well, we are looking for members of the site to help write each week and are looking for anyone who has any interest. We have a few new sections opening up right now, and we would love for you to see if they would be anything of interest to you. If you are interested, please check out the thread or contact @mix to discuss joining the team behind the HF News.

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/statistics-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[img=800x400]https://i.gyazo.com/c4bd88bd1cf9fa990c30843b557124b7.png[/img]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/awards-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]
[color=#ffffff]

[b]Quick reminder, the donation awards page has had a bit of a change. Some of the classic awards are back up for purchase. If you would like to check out what is new, head over to the donation award page to snipe up some of the awards today.  Or [url=https://hackforums.net/buyawards.php][u]Click Here![/u][/url][/b]
[b]

[mention=1433804] Has obtained the "Medal of Honor" award - [award=117]
[mention=628586] Has obtained the "King Decade" award - [award=194]
[mention=2] Has obtained the "King Decade" award - [award=194]

[mention=2509344] Has obtained the "King Decade" award - [award=194]
[mention=5655318] Has obtained the "Flip Reaper" award - [award=222]
[mention=5568595] Has obtained the "Stanley Fan" award - [award=230]
[/color][/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/groups-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=3929084]

[b][u]GROUPS FOR SALE AND SOLD[/u][/b]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6241882]Succubus group[/url] is still listed for sale by [mention=3604010]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6302394]Olympians group & Benevolence [/url] are listed for sale by [mention=1342286]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6307026]Fidelity[/url] group has been listed for sale by [mention=811]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6304410]Mystery Inc[/url] listed for sale by [mention=3909991]

No recent group sales.


[B][u]RECENT GROUP CHANGES & EVENTS[/u][/B]

There are no recent reported group changes in the last week.

[b][size=large][u]RECRUITMENTS:[/u][/size][/b]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6298855]Casino Recruitment[/url]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6226725]Pink LSZ Recruitment[/url]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6304113]Warriors Recruitment[/url]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/music-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[b]This week we are introducing a brand-new section to the HF News. This section will grow over time to more things, but for now we are just going to be doing Song of the week. We are open to what more we could bring to the section from your suggestions, but as a start, we feel adding the song of the week will be a great start for the section and lead the way forward for more things in the future.[/b]

[b]Now we know some of you may question what the song of the week is all about, and we have thought of what a great answer. We feel like the song of the week should be a meaningful song that goes deeper than just general music and has meaning to it all. Granted, we may have a little fun with it sometimes. (Yes, we will have a Halloween version and Christmas version too.) But we want to keep it at a level where we have found the song has a true message behind it all and not just something that everyone will just see as another song that is just a bit catchy or got a good few beats to it. We hope this helps those with that question and if anyone has anything that they wish to ask, please feel free to add them below. We are more than happy to give the reason behind it.[/b]

[b][size=large][color=#ffffff]This weeks Song Of The Week:[/color][/size][/b]

[video=youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s_nc1IVoMxc&list=RDs_nc1IVoMxc&start_radio=1&pp=ygUGSGkgcmVuoAcB[/video]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/contests.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=3929084]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6305248]
$100 USD (BTC) Contest || Celebrating My Acceptance in The Academy[/url] By [mention=4189082] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

A new contest has been created this week by @W1NK1LL3RX. They have recently been accepted into The Academy, and they feel like it's time for them to share the love by making a massive $100 BTC giveaway to one lucky winner. Let's make sure to spread the love, and thank them for the contest. The contest ends September 30th, 2025. Make sure you get yourself entered before it's too late.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6304791]$75 ETH Crypto Contest | Celebrating my upgrade to L33T[/url] By [mention=5670768] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

If you are looking to get your hands on some free ETH, the user known as CyberGiggler has the thread for you. They have recently started a contest for everyone on site, and you can get your hands on an entry right now. All you will need to do is head over to the thread and follow the three steps to enter, and you could get your hands on that $75 ETH on the 2nd of September. Good luck to everyone who enters!

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6303945]$50 Crypto Contest || Celebrating my upgrade to Ub3r[/url] By [mention=5655318] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

Another contest is also giving away $50 worth of free crypto too. This member has recently just got themselves Ub3R on site and is celebrating becoming Ub3R by giving away to one lucky winner a $50 crypto. Once again, they have a few requirements for the contest, but everyone can easily enter this lovely contest and will get themselves an easy $50 to do whatever they want with it. Make sure you check this one out as it's worth checking it out!

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6306653]$10 Giveaway[/url] By [mention=5523666] [/color][/size][/b][/u]
Who's after some easy crypto? Swing by this thread and follow some very simple steps and join this giveaway, get in quick as the giveaway closes on the 15th September!
There wasn't any reason on the thread as to why they're running this giveaway so I reached out to the member running it, this is what they said. "[i]I am looking forward to share my old group Dev's over HF and also like to give someone a chance to upgrade, atm I don't have that much clue even tho I registered a year and half ago so I decided to do what I felt was good. I upgraded myself and did the giveaway so I could give someone a chance to upgrade.[/i]"

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/user.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[b]
[size=large]Remember if you have reached an achievement on your account feel free to post about it on our weekly reports thread. That way we can add you to the news for the next edition. [u][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299864]Click Here To See The Weekly Reports Thread[/url][/u][/size]
[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/tech-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer –[/b][/size] [mention=5465469]


[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]SentinelOne brings sovereign cybersecurity platform to Europe[/color][/size][/b][/u]
SentinelOne has now teamed up with Schwarz Digits to unveil a sovereign, an AI-powered cybersecurity solution hosted entirely on German cloud systems. This platform complies fully with GDPR standards and is built smarter to bolster Europe’s digital independence.
[b][url=https://www.techzine.eu/news/security/134385/sentinelone-brings-sovereign-cybersecurity-to-europe/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]North Korean hackers launch fake job interview scam targeting hundreds[/color][/size][/b][/u]
Hackers which are linked to North Korea are running a large-scale phishing operation disguised as job interviews. This scam has targeted hundreds of people in an effort to steal personal and organizational data, highlighting how social engineering tactics are evolving.  
[b][url=https://www.securityweek.com/north-korean-hackers-targeted-hundreds-in-fake-job-interview-attacks/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Federal cyber information-sharing bill renewal gains traction[/color][/size][/b][/u]
The U.S. House has approved a renewed version of the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act, which is now called “Wimwag.” The update extends legal protections until 2035 and also includes modernized language to address emerging cyber threats.  
[b][url=https://www.wsj.com/articles/federal-cyber-information-sharing-bill-renewal-inches-forward-472b16d7]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Hexstrike, An AI exploit platform being abused to accelerate cyberattacks[/color][/size][/b][/u]
Check Point researchers are raising alarms over the misuse of Hexstrike-AI. Which was originally built to automate cybersecurity defenses, the platform is now being exploited by threat actors to carry out faster, more coordinated attacks.  
[b][url=https://digitrendz.blog/newswire/artificial-intelligence/41882/hackers-weaponize-hexstrike-ai-to-speed-up-cyberattacks/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Google fixes 84 Android vulnerabilities, including two active zero-days[/color][/size][/b][/u]
Google’s latest September patch fixes 84 Android security flaws, which included two zero-day vulnerabilities (CVE-2025-38352 and CVE-2025-48543) that are currently being exploited in the wild. Now, All users are strongly advised to update their devices immediately.  
[b][url=https://www.tomsguide.com/computing/online-security/google-just-fixed-84-android-security-flaws-including-two-actively-exploited-zero-days-update-your-phone-right-now]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Stealerium malware surge: urgent wraparound threat alert[/color][/size][/b][/u]
Security analysts have flagged a significant rise in Stealerium malware campaign drives. These attacks steal sensitive data, such as crypto wallet credentials, browser logins, and webcam footage, which are often delivered through channels like Discord and GoFile.
[b][url=https://www.itpro.com/security/malware/cybersecurity-experts-issue-urgent-warning-amid-surge-in-stealerium-malware-attacks]Source[/url][/b]

[/align]
posts.subject: Hack Forum News - Edition 13

posts.message:
[align=center]
[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/world-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]France’s Government Falls[/color][/size][/b][/u]

French Prime Minister François Bayrou lost a confidence vote in the National Assembly, failing to secure a majority of support. He is expected to officially resign on Tuesday morning. This outcome deepens France’s political instability, pitching President Macron into a search for yet another prime minister the fifth in under two years.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2025/sep/08/europe-live-macron-france-prime-minister-francois-bayrou-confidence-vote-latest-news]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Deadly Shooting in Jerusalem[/color][/size][/b][/u]

A terrorist attack occurred at a bus stop near Jerusalem’s Ramot Junction, where two Palestinian gunmen killed six people before being shot dead by a soldier and an armed civilian.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-gunmen-kill-six-jerusalem-bus-stop-shooting-2025-09-08]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]U.S. Signals Stronger Sanctions[/color][/size][/b][/u]

In a briefing on Ukraine, President Trump indicated readiness to impose additional sanctions on Russia, with support upcoming from Europe and possible implementation of oil-related tariffs. Ukraine President Zelenskyy critiqued a recent meeting in Alaska that he felt gave undue visibility to Putin.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/2025/sep/08/ukraine-war-briefing-trump-says-yeah-i-am-ready-for-more-russia-sanctions]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Hostage Crisis and Ceasefire Talks[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Donald Trump, via Truth Social, issued a “last warning” to Hamas to accept U.S.-proposed terms for a ceasefire and hostage exchange. He claimed Israel had accepted these terms and voiced hope for the return of all hostages, including those presumed dead. Hamas confirmed they had received these suggestions through mediators and were exploring them, though no agreement has been disclosed.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/after-issuing-last-warning-hamas-trump-eyes-gaza-deal-soon-2025-09-07]Source[/url][/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/comics-header.png[/img]
